model.board

Class ArrayListBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.board.ArrayListBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board

    public class ArrayListBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Board
    ArrayList implementation of Board. Handles the internal table as a two-dimensional ArrayList containing Cell objects. Enables easier dynamic board implementation, but incurs a sizable computation overhead when iterating through the table.
